name: Commodities and options
text:
[§551E‑37]  Commodities and options.  Unless the power of attorney otherwise provides, language in a power of attorney granting general authority with respect to commodities and options shall authorize the agent to:
     (1)  Buy, sell, exchange, assign, settle, and exercise commodity futures contracts and call or put options on stocks or stock indexes traded on a regulated option exchange; and
     (2)  Establish, continue, modify, and terminate option accounts. [L 2014, c 22, pt of §1]
